### Read Things
We'll be transitioning out of Base R to the Tidyverse. To get an idea of what that looks like by reading a couple of articles from Hadley Wickham:

1. Wickham, H. (2010). A Layered Grammar of Graphics. *Journal of
Computational and Graphical Statistics 19*(1), 3-28. [https://doi.org/10.1198/jcgs.2009.07098](https://doi.org/10.1198/jcgs.2009.07098){target="_blank"}
2. Wickham, H. (2013). Graphical Criticism: Some Historical Notes, *Journal of Computational and Graphical Statistics, 22*(1), 38-44. [https://doi.org/ 10.1080/10618600.2012.761140](https://doi.org/ 10.1080/10618600.2012.761140){target="_blank"}
